title: Five-Star Medieval Palace Stay with Daily Breakfast and Spa Access in Italy’s Puglia Region
description: Explore one of Italy’s most incredible regions, Puglia, while staying at the stunning Palazzo Ducale Venturi - Luxury Relais & Wellness, housed in a renovated 16th century palace. Discover the rich history, splendid architecture and amazing food of Puglia while enjoying daily breakfast, a bottle of IGP Prosecco or soft drink on arrival, complimentary access to the underground heated spa and a EUR30 spa credit to be used towards relaxing couple’s massages.
location_description: Palazzo Ducale Venturi - Luxury Relais & Wellness
